|rad1chip3 = |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "MADE IN TAIWAN" and "??00M400C" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. This would seem to indicate the device was manufactured by SerComm. The Flash for these devices appears to be 1MB. 8MB RAM? [http://www.myopenrouter.com/forum/thread/10221/wgr614-v4---Can-tomato-be-loaded-to-this-router/ Seems to be '''eCos''' based].. Per the [http://www.seattlewireless.net/NetgearWGR614#v4 Seattle Wireless wiki (WGR614 page)] (which appears to be sourced from [http://www.linux-hacker.net/cgi-bin/UltraBoard/UltraBoard.pl?Action=ShowPost&Board=RG&Post=5&Idle=0&Sort=0&Order=Descend&Page=0&Session= this linux-hacker.net thread]), the v4 uses the 88W8510 and has a 88E6060 switch. Per the manual, the default SSID is '''NETGEAR'''. WiGLE would seem to indicate the device has the '''Marvell-AP32''' when booting ([http://www.wikidevi.com/wiki/Special:Ask?title=Special%3AAsk&q=%5B%5BDefault+SSID%3A%3AMarvell-AP32%5D%5D&po=%3FFCC+ID%0D%0A%3FManuf%0D%0A%3FOEM+model%0D%0A%3FCPU1+model%0D%0A%3FFLA1+amount%0D%0A%3FRAM1+amount%0D%0A%3FSwitch+model%0D%0A%3FWI1+chip1+model%0D%0A%3FDefault+SSID%0D%0A&sort%5B0%5D=&order%5B0%5D=ASC&sort_num=&order_num=ASC&eq=yes&p%5Bformat%5D=broadtable&p%5Blimit%5D=500&p%5Bsort%5D=&p%5Boffset%5D=&p%5Bheaders%5D=show&p%5Bmainlabel%5D=&p%5Blink%5D=all&p%5Bsearchlabel%5D=&p%5Bintro%5D=&p%5Boutro%5D=&p%5Bdefault%5D=&p%5Bclass%5D=sortable+wikitable+smwtable&eq=yes like other Marvell AP-32 based units]) [http://powerforen.de/forum/showthread.php?t=165064] ==Links of Interest== [http://support.netgear.com/product/WGR614v4 Product page] :[http://www.downloads.netgear.com/files/GDC/WGR614V4/WGR614v4_datasheet_10May2004.pdf Datasheet] :[http://www.downloads.netgear.com/files/wgr614v4_install_guide.pdf Installation Guide] :[http://www.downloads.netgear.com/files/wgr614v4_ref_manual.zip Reference manual] :[http://www.downloads.netgear.com/files/GDC/WGR614V4/WGR614v4%20Firmware%20Version%205.0_07.zip Firmware Version 5.0_07] :[http://kbserver.netgear.com/de-support/wgr614v4.html Download site (german firmware)] :[ftp://ftp.netgear.de/download/WGR614/wgr614v4_v4.0_70gr.zip Firmware Version 4.0.70 (deutsch) 579125 bytes] :[ftp://downloads.netgear.com/pub/netgear/files/ Older (and current) firmware & manuals are also available from netgear's ftp site:]
